S1.name: Strike of Flagbearer
S1.description: Attacks with a flag. 75% chance to inflict Silence for 1 turn. If target is silenced, decreases CR by 25%.

S2.name: Target Lock
S2.description: Dispels all buffs from enemy, 100% chance to inflict Target for 2 turns. All allies attack with basic skill. Increases caster CR by 30%.

S3.name: Flag of Victory
S3.description: Dispels 2 buffs from all enemies. 100% chance to inflict Fear for 2 turns and decrease CR by 20%. Grants Speed buff to allies for 2 turns.
